content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In Sales Research we provide research on various aspects of clients or prospects. Topics cover account/prospect research, contact research, market research, or personalized research requests. It's an important tool in the Presales and Sales toolbox to craft offerings, meetings, and presentations based on the best available information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To complete this training please schedule a 30min meeting with\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Darya_Miadzvetskay@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Darya Miadzvetskay\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"with the title “Presales Onboarding – Sales Research”. After you have completed the face to face training you can mark this task as complete.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: This Training is only relevant for Presales Consultants. Presales Designers can simply confirm the checkbox at the end of this page.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Important additional information\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please don't be shy to schedule the meeting. Just respect peoples Outlook calendar availability and try to schedule it in the first half of the working day (roughly between 1-4pm)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please try to schedule the meeting to take place within your first five working days at EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can take a look at the presentation that will be the basis of the training\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://teams.microsoft.com/l/file/259B8632-E111-463C-A1F8-BB9411945959?tenantId=b41b72d0-4e9f-4c26-8a69-f949f367c91d&fileType=pptx&objectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fepam.sharepoint.com%2Fsites%2FPresalesExcellence%2FShared%2520Documents%2F03_Training_and_Guidelines%2FA_06_Sales%2520Research%2FSales%2520Research%2520Onboarding%2520Training.pptx&serviceName=teams&threadId=19:b028a8d3a0cd40d4a30d2c4c9767c5b9@thread.skype&groupId=3da39aac-d7eb-4a5d-9994-60889c79cc9b\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3a7809fd-c6c6-411b-9dd3-8fbf1d411fd0/image2019-11-21_11-46-49.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":660,\"height\":313}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
